title: Ep 81 | Jase's Clint Eastwood Test, Almost Losing Phil's Boat & Getting Caught with Your Pants Down
description:
When you gotta go, you gotta go ... even when you're on a boat in the middle of the river. Phil, Jase, and Al describe the ins and outs of using nature's bathroom. Jase gets slimed by an alligator gar and almost loses Phil's boat. The guys discuss missing the forest for the trees when it comes to Jesus. And Jase recalls the the time he and Willie argued over requiring Duck Commander employees to watch "The Outlaw Josey Wales."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
